name: Dead Roadkill Highway
description:
Dead Roadkill Highway is zombie apocalypse, action packed, thrill game, where you have to drive through never ending siberian decayed highway wasteland to survive, because your hometown is overrun by zombies and needs evacuation. At beggining you have small amount of money, old truck car and lesser quality hit gun that will easier your combat. The principe of game is simple: avoid other cars and obstacles in your path and get as far as you can. Whole level is full of leaping stupid dangerous zombies squads. If any zombie jumps on your vehicle, you will get into trouble and maybe die. Don't get overrun by dangerous zombie hordes that want eat your brain, what a painful horrible death. You have to shoot them as fast possible, because they affects the way how car if controlled. Your speed car also have a powerful nitro, so you can drive much faster and earn more money in this race of life. Use nitro boosts to increase your odds of survival in this chaos mayhem carnage! Earn money to buy better cars and power-ups! Upgrade, armor up and personalize your vehicle and get ultimate zombie smash force of destruction. Earn cash and buy powerful weapons to kill zombie mutants that want to spread viral plague to you. With this arsenal you will eliminate any living dead creatures that threats your hazard life.
You have two way of controls - tilt or tap buttons.

- Advanced excellent 3D graphics, amazing smooth gameplay, beautiful environment in all devices
- Impressive Arsenal of fire arms - handguns, shotguns, and automatics ( ak47, sniper, glock )
- Fully destructible Vehicles
- Interesting challenging madness journey ( trip ) of escape
- Road full of gore and zombies that you have to smash and crush
